overview:
Cimarron leads Apperian’s products and marketing for enterprise solutions. He has worked in technology for over 20 years, providing creative and visionary leadership for products and services in the technology, web and mobile arena.

Previously, Cimarron was at Texterity, where he launched the new generation of magazine and publishing industry solutions for mobile devices. He also served as GM Internet Products for FaxNet, which was acquired by Critical Path.

Cimarron has held executive marketing and product planning positions at Funk Software and Cayman Systems. Cimarron received a BA in Computer Science from University of California, San Diego, and an MBA from Harvard Business School .
